helpers

Class DatabaseHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • helpers.DatabaseHelper

  • public class DatabaseHelper
extends java.lang.Object
    DatabaseHelper is a helper class for all interactions with the SQLite database. This class includes the following functionality:
    • Establish connection to the database
    • Create Users table
    • Create Transactions table
    • Add users to the users table
    • Update users in the users table
    • Authenticate log in
    • Check for existing username to be used during signup
    Author:
    Sungjae Kim

    • Method Detail

      • connect

        public void connect()
        Establishes connection to the database. Creates the "Users" and "Transactions" table if they do not exist. Add a default test user into the database.

      • createUsersTable

        public void createUsersTable()
        Creates the "Users" table in the database

      • createTransactionsTable

        public void createTransactionsTable()
        Creates the "Transactions" table in the database

      • addUser

        public void addUser(models.UserModel user)
        Adds user to the Users table.
        Parameters:
        user - a user object containing the user information
        See Also:
        UserModel

        public void updateUser(java.lang.String userName,
                       java.lang.String firstName,
                       java.lang.String lastName,
                       java.lang.String password,
                       java.lang.String email)
        Updates user in the Users table.
        Parameters:
        userName - user name of the user
        firstName - first name of the user
        lastName - last name of the user
        email - email of the user
        password - password of the user

      • addTransactionToDb

        public void addTransactionToDb(double price,
                               java.sql.Timestamp date,
                               int userId,
                               int numStocks)
        Adds transaction to the Transactions table.
        Parameters:
        price - the price of the stock bought
        date - the time of transaction
        userId - the id of the user making the transaction
        numStocks - the number of stocks bought

      • authenticateUser

        public boolean authenticateUser(java.lang.String username,
                                java.lang.String password)
        Authenticates user trying to log in.
        Parameters:
        username - user name of the user
        password - password of the user
        Returns:
        true if the user is authenticated and false if not authenticated

      • checkExistingUsername

        public boolean checkExistingUsername(java.lang.String username)
        Checks to see if the username already exists in the users table.
        Parameters:
        username - user name of the user
        Returns:
        true if the username is found and returns false if not found
